channel.title: Webapp on XeroLinux HQ
channel.description: Recent content in Webapp on XeroLinux HQ

item.title: Ferdium WebApp
item.description: What is it ? # Ferdium is a desktop app that helps you organize how you use your favourite apps by combining them into one application. It is based on Franz - a software already used by thousands of people - with the difference that Ferdium gives you many additional features and doesn’t restrict its usage!
